mapper.select: select nvl(max(avg(star)),0) as star from review where contentId = #{contentId} group by contentId
select count(*) as review_count from review where contentId = #{contentId}
select contentId from (select contentId, avg(star) as star from review group by contentId order by star desc) where rownum <= 3
select contentId from (select contentId, count(*) as keep from keep group by contentId order by keep desc) where rownum <= 3
